content: Create new git branch 'matrix-design' for the redesign
Implement terminal/matrix-inspired dark theme with green/amber colors
Create code rain animation component for hero section
Build interactive bridge metaphor with animated particles
Replace Services section with terminal-style file tree navigation
Add mini code editor showcase component
Implement terminal boot sequence on page load
Update Hero component with matrix theme and terminal styling
Update Header component to match matrix theme
Test the updated design and fix any issues
